item.title: Awk
item.description: Print Lines Containing tom, jerry AND vivek awk '/tom|jerry|vivek/' /etc/passwd Specify : as seperator awk -F: '{print $1}' /etc/passwd use of printf awk '{printf "%s ",$2}' file Command line on bash awk ' BEGIN { actions } /pattern/ { actions } /pattern/ { actions } â€¦â€¦â€¦. END { actions } ' filenames Execute a awk script awk -f mypgoram.awk input.txt #### Process and print echo 4000000 | awk '{print $1*10^-6 " Wh"}'

item.title: Find
item.description: Find files of size more than 1G find . -type f -size +1G find and delete find /home -type f -size +1G -delete find in all dir find /path -iname 'yourstring*' -type f find . -name 'mystring*'
